modName: Derkeethus and Ghorbash - Your enhanced Lovers
summary:
Derk and Ghor can now level up to lv. 200. Fixed Skills and Combat Style. Added complementary perks.
Optional: Custom looks and 2-handed versions, all files compatible with eachother. Item/Spell Bonus.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#ff0000]Don't let the mod name scare you away, this is a basic follower mod for skill/combat and [i]optional[/i] appearance improvement.
Everything else requires SAM (Shape Atlas for Men) to be installed.
(check recommended mods for more info on SAM)
[/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/dUE7bmt.png[/img][/center][b]

[size=4][u]TL;DR:[/u][/size][/b]

[i]Files are seperate, you can choose to install either Derk or Ghor or both.[/i]
[i]File explanation at the bottom of the page.[/i]

Recommended files to use:
[color=#ff0000][b]DerkGuardRange[/b][/color][color=#ff0000][b].esp
GhorGuardBrute.esp[/b][/color]

This mod allows Derk/Ghor to level up to Lv 200 with you.
Both are now essential and cannot die.
No longer run away in fights, can now commit any crime. (foolhardy & won't report you)
Fixed Skill distribution. (Range -> 1-Handed/Bow/LightArmour/Block ; Brute -> 2-Handed/HeavyArmour *optional*)
Adds usefull perks (Waterbreathing) and Healing+Ebonyskin spell.
Dual Wielding enabled.
Will use Magic Scrolls and similar Items.
[font=Arial][size=1](also perks for every weapon type and Magicka type added, so you can decide what to let them fight with and they still will dish out good damage, to teach them attack spells refer to Follower Tweak Mod at Index Point 8., skill distrib priorities at Point 3.)[/size][/font][b]
[/b]Increased Movement Speed. (can keep up with you finally)
Optional Custom Looks available. (Guard Files, recommended for both)
Optional 2-Handed fighter mods available. (Brute Files, recommended for Ghorbash)

Check out the recommended mods and equipment items to enhance this one and your gaming experience overall!
(Index Point 8. and 9.)

(This mod may be an overkill for [b]anything below Adept difficulty setting[/b] at early levels, my personal recommendation is playing on at least
Expert or Master)


[b]
[size=5]Index:[/size][/b]

1. Summary for Derkeethus and Ghorbash
2. Default and Guardian
3. Brute and Range
4. NoInv Files & 100
5. Installation
6. Compatibilty
7. Troubleshooting
8. Recommended Mods to use Enhanced Lovers with
9. Recommended SAM Settings and Gear for the best experience
10. TL:DR, file explanation
11. Optional Extra

(See Trouleshooting if things don't work right away, other than that it is recommended to just start a new game if nothing works out)




[u][b]1. Summary for Derkeethus and Ghorbash[/b][/u]

- Optional Custom Look (you can choose between Guardian and Default)
[color=#ff0000][size=1][i](files are interchangable anytime! Meaning: If you want to try out the Guardian look, just replace your current Default mod with (or vice versa) it without losing any of the perks/skill and no wrong statting to happen)[/i][/size][/color]
- Essential NPC's (cannot die)
- Level up to level 200 with you
- Foolhardy confidence and any crime (no longer run away during fights / won't report you, no bounty, etc.)
- Healing and Ebonyskin spells
- Waterbreathing
- Magic Scrolls and similar item will be used during fights
- Complementary perks (can carry more, won't trigger traps, can sneak with you, etc.)
- Dual Wielding enabled
- Weapon and Magicka perks
Meaning:[size=1] if you don't want them to fight with 1-Handed / Bows or 2-Handed weapons, you can decide to teach them spells (via Follower mod @ Point 8.) or let them dual wield or whatever and they still will dish out good damage and stat the respective skills.
Check Point 3. for their skill distribution priorities. (even if Magicka is least, it'll still work out fine if you want it that way)[/size]

- Increased Movement Speed (they will now be able to keep up with you)
- Lore friendly (ranger & 1-handed) and Theme friendly (2-handed) mod files
- Optional "No Inventory" files to allow you to fully customize their outfits or have them walk around naked


[u][b]2. Default and Guardian[/b][/u]

You may choose between 2 different file types, which are Default and Guardian.

Default:
Will keep the characters original looks with all improvements added.
For those who fell in love with the followers/spouses original looks and never want to miss those.

Guardian:
Guardian files will add a new custom look that compliments the nature of Derkeethus and Ghorbash in addition to all the other improvements, to allow them to fullfill their role as a caring follower/spouse.
Both, Derk and Ghor, will be taller than the player.

While Derkeethus' look is meant to enhance his romantic and loyal aspects
towards the player, it also keeps his modest and proud look, delivering
you a picture of someone that will always be on your side, no matter
what.

The same counts for Ghorbash, though along with his caring aspects, his look is meant to deliver a more overprotective and
brute/barbaric look.
A true Orc that will go berserk if anyone dares to touch his love, while when alone with you, he will be the most
peaceful and loving person in all of Skyrim.


[u][b]3. Brute and Range[/b][/u]

(even though Magicka gets the least skill point priorities, you can still have them cast magic and deal reasonable damage thanks to the added perks, if you want them to be your mage helpers)

Skill Distribution weight is as follows:
Main: 5
Secondary: 3 - 2
Least: 1 - 2

[u]Brute:[/u]
Mod files with "Brute" in their name will change Derkeethus/Ghorbash into 2-handed fighters.
[color=#dd7e6b][u][i]This is highly recommended to be used for Ghorbash[/i][/u],[/color] as it fits the nature of Orcs and his protective role as lover much more than the regular 1-handed/ranger style.

Brutes will have their Skill distribution as follows:

Main: 2-Handed / Heavy Armour
Secondary: 1-Handed / Light Armour / Block
Least: Ranged / Magicka


[u]Range:[/u]
Mod files with "Range" are lore friendly files, as they fix the current intended skill distribution and fighting style and allow Derk & Ghor to properly stat their 1-handed and ranged skills.

Range's will have their Skill distribution as follows:

Main: Ranged / 1-Handed / Block
Secondary: 2-Handed / Heavy Armor
Least: Magicka


[color=#b4a7d6][u]Range or Brute?[/u][/color]

It is up to you to decide, though my personal recommendation is:

[b]Ghorbash[/b]: GhorGuardBrute.esp
[b]Derkeethus[/b]: DerkGuardRange.esp

Together with the recommended equipment items listed at point [size=4][b]9.[/b][/size]
(The Hat is a MUST for Derk, and the Daedric Battleaxe for Ghor)


[u][b]4. NoInv Files[/b][b] & 100[/b][/u]

[color=#ffd966][b]NoInv[/b] [/color]stands for "no inventory".
These files have the entire inventory of Derk & Ghor removed. (exception are essential items such as Ghorbash's House Key)
This makes those files very friendly to be used with the [b]SAM [/b]or [b]SOS [/b]mod, allowing naked models to be shown.
It also allows you to be able to decide what gear your follower/spouse should wear (if any at all *Q*)

No matter if you have [b]SAM/SOS[/b] installed or not, these files are recommended to be used as they allow you to fully customize their clothes.


[color=#ffd966][b]100[/b][/color] stands for the value of their weight.
Recommended for those who don't use [b]SAM [/b]or [b]SOS[/b] but still want them to have a muscular body, these files are best to use.

In general you can favour 100-files over the others, unless you want Derkeethus and Ghorbash to stay as thin as they normally are.



[u][b]5. Installation:[/b][/u]

1. Move your desired file into the:

...Skyrim\Data\

folder.

2. Make sure to use only ONE Derkeethus and ONE Ghorbash file at the same time!
(you can use both, Derk and Ghor files at the same time, but 2x Derk or 2x Ghor files will cause problems)

3. Make sure, for maximum compatibilty, both mod files are loaded LAST.

4. Start a new game or continue your current journey!



[u][b]6. Compatibilty[/b][/u]

This mod should work 100% with every other mod, without causing any problems, as long as the mod files are loaded LAST.

[b]NOINV[/b] and [b]Guardian[/b] files are optimized for the [u][i][b]Shape Atlas for Men (SAM)[/b][/i][/u] and[u][i] Schlongs of Skyrim (SOS)[/i][/u] mod.

Highly recommended mods to use with this one are listed at point [size=4][b]8.[/b]
[/size]


[u][b]7. Troubleshooting[/b][/u]

I've installed the mod for follower/spouse XY but their looks/inventory didn't update.
[quote]Try and wait a minute or two after you start the game.
Like any other mod (SAM, SoS, etc.), where you would have to wait for a message for it to
be "installed", this one might take a little while to fully load in
(this mod doesn't show a message like that though).

Make sure that when you open the console and click on Derkeethus or Ghorbash, that
on the lower right corner it reads the respective .esp file.
I.e. "DerkGuardRange.esp".

After you've waited a few minutes, try changing the area (as in enter a cave) and then look at Derkeethus/Ghorbash.
This should usually work, if not try the following:

Take all of Derk's/Ghor's items/equipment.
Open the console.
Left click on them or use the prid command to focus them.
Type in "removeallitems" and then "resetinventory".

The first command might need you to enter the ID after it, if using the prid command or clicking on them to focus doesn't work.
"removeallitems <actor or container ID>"[/quote]Ok, the mod works but my follower keeps respawning a Hunting Bow and Arrows, this is annoying!
I want them to use weapon XY and/or for them to fight with their hands!
What shall I do?
[quote]This will usually only happen once. To fully get rid of it do the following and then save your game afterwards!

1. Open the console while having your follower/spouse visible
2. Click on your follower/spouse while the console is open or use the "prid BASE ID" command to focus them
3. Type in "showinventory"
4. Now all items in possession are listed up
5. Look for the ID numbers of the Hunting Bow and Arrows AND their amount of items!
(usually 1 bow and 12 arrows, sometimes 100 arrows if a follower mod is installed)

6. Type in the following now:

removeitem ID QUANTITIY

Example:
removeitem 00013985 1
(will remove 1 hunting bow from the inventory of the currently focused (prid or clicked) character)

7. Use the "removeitem" command on the respawned Bow and Arrows.
8. Save your game now.
9. Now the Bow and Arrow will no longer respawn and if no weapon is equipped your follower/spouse will use his fists![/quote]

[u][b]8. Recommended Mods to use Enhanced Lovers with:[/b][/u]

All these mods will work amazingly well with Enhanced Lovers.
Especially recommended are SAM and Dynamic Argonian Tail.
But for the best experience, install all of them!

- [url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?topic=8263.0]Shape Atlas for Men (SAM)[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61420/]Dynamic Argonian Tail (for SAM)[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13050/?]No Naked Comments[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22538/]Phinix No Friendly Fire[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9378/]Multiple Marriages [/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11370/] Spouses can live everywhere[/url]



[u][b]9. Recommended SAM Settings and Gear for the best experience:[/b][/u]

[quote]Size Multiplier: 5.0

Scaling Settings for Samuel:

Neck/Head: -0.010
Clavicle/Shoulders: 0.110
Upper Arms: -0.090
Forearms: -0.050
Hands: 0.060
Upper Torso: 0.040
Middle Torso: 0.030
Lower Torso: 0.125
Waist: 0.250
Feet: 0.250[/quote]
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/4lkTmck.png[/img][/center]

General Equipment:

[quote]If SAM is used:
Elven Light Armour Set (Body,Boots,Gloves) without helmet

Otherwise or also with SAM possible:
Cultist Robes
Cultist Gloves
Dwarven Boots[/quote][color=#38761D][b][color=#B45F06]General Recommendation:[/color]
[/b][color=#ffff00]For the best experience you should use a Range file for Derkeethus and a Brute file for Ghorbash.
As said above, my personal recommendation for the best feeling is:

Derkeethus:[color=#ff0000] DerkGuardRange.esp[/color] with[color=#ff0000] [b]Derkeethus the Loving protector[/b] [/color]settings
Ghorbash: [color=#ff0000]GhorGuardBrute.esp[/color] with[/color][b] [color=#ff0000][b]Ghorbash the Brute lover[/b][/color][color=#38761D][color=#ffff00] settings[/color][/color]


[color=#e69138]SAM Actor Settings and Equipment:
[/color]
Derkeethus the Loving protector[/b][/color]
(Strong Muscular Chubby)

Equipment [color=#cc4125]Range-Files:[/color]
Hat (found in Gerdur's House on the small shelf left of the double-sized bed, VERY RECOMMENDED, A MUST FOR DERK!!!)
Falmer Axe
Falmer Shield
Falmer Bow
Falmer Arrows

Equipment [color=#ff0000]Brute-Files:[/color]

Stalhrim Warhammer
Falmer Axe
Falmer Shield

SAM Settings:

Height: 120
Samson: 0
Samuel: 100

Uncut

[color=#38761D][b]Derkeethus the Wise protector[/b][/color]
(Strong Muscular)

Equipment: same as above

SAM Settings:

Samuel: 20
Schlong Size - 30
Schlong Taper - 90
Testicles Size - 30

[color=#38761D][b]Ghorbash the Brute lover[/b][/color]
(Strong Dominant Chubby Fighter)

Equipment [color=#ff0000]Range-Files:[/color]
Orcish Axe
Orcish Bow
Orcish Arrows
Orcish Shield

Equipment [color=#ff0000]Brute-Files:[/color]

Orcish Shield
Orcish Axe

Samson: 15
Samuel: 85
Schlong Size - 55

Uncut

(Strong Muscular)

Uncut

[u][b]
10. TL:DR, file explanation:[/b][/u]

Derkeethus:

DerkDEFAULTRange - Original looks
DerkDEFAULTRangeNoInv - Original looks without inventory (allows naked model)

DerkDEF100Range - Original looks with maximum weight for a muscular body
DerkDEF100RangeNoInv - Original looks with maximum weight for a muscular body (allows naked model)

DerkDEFBruteNoInv - [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color] with Original looks (allows naked model)
DerkDEFBruteNoInv100 - [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color] with Original looks and with maximum weight for a muscular body (allows naked model)

DerkGuardRange - [color=#ff0000]Custom looks[/color], no inventory for naked models
DerkGuardBrute - [color=#ff0000]Custom looks[/color], no inventory for naked models, [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color]


Ghorbash:

GhorDEFAULTRange - Original looks
GhorDEFAULTRangeNoInv - Original looks without inventory (allows naked model)

GhorDEF100Range - Original looks with maximum weight for a muscular body
GhorDEF100RangeNoInv - Original looks with maximum weight for a muscular body (allows naked model)

GhorDEFBruteNoInv - [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color] with Original looks (allows naked model)
GhorDEFBruteNoInv100 - [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color] with Original looks and with maximum weight for a muscular body (allows naked model)

GhorGuardRange - [color=#ff0000]Custom looks[/color], no inventory for naked models
GhorGuardBrute - [color=#ff0000]Custom looks[/color], no inventory for naked models, [color=#ff0000]Now a 2-Handed fighter[/color]


[u][b]11. Extra Candlelight Spell and Torches and Bond of Matrimony[/b][/u]

ItemSpellExtra.esp contains modifications for a spell and some items:


[color=#6aa84f]Candlelight Spell:[/color] Now lasts [color=#00ffff]10 minutes[/color] instead of only [color=#00ffff]1 minute[/color] with slightly increased mana costs (45)

[color=#00ff00](Dragonborn and normal) Torch:[/color] [color=#00ffff]Lasts forever[/color], won't get used up anymore

[color=#00ff00]Bond of Matrimony:[/color] Now is considered [color=#00ffff]Heavy Armour[/color], adds [color=#00ffff]extra carrying capacity [color=#ffffff]and some [/color]armour[/color]
[size=1][i](Ring you get when you marry someone)[/i][/size]
author: DerkAndMe

files.name: Derkeethus 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Reanimate Corpse and Raise Zombie spells
Adjusted Movement Speed
Fixed File Names

files.name: Ghorbash 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Removed Reanimate Corpse and Raise Zombie spells
Adjusted Movement Speed
Fixed File Names

files.name: Enhanced Lovers 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Spells and Skills revamped
2-Handed version added for Derkeethus
Brute and Range are now available for Guardian files
Extra Item & Spell file added
